page.title: CivFleetsUI
page.descr: Text needed by this mod for GUI
page.t: Determines if civilian fleets should automatically update its fleet name \(will only affect future rename attempts\).\n\nEnabled by default, effective immediately.

Determines if civilian fleets, if auto-rename is enabled, should also include the name of the anchor \(usually a space station or a location\) of the fleet leader when renaming \(will only affect future rename attempts\).\n\nEnabled by default, effective immediately.
